body:
House leadership, the presidential campaign and more are scheduled for discussion on the Sunday news shows. Here are the guest lineups, as compiled by the Associated Press.
ABC’s “This Week”
U.S. Rep. Jason Chaffetz (R., Utah); Republican presidential candidate Bobby Jindal
NBC’s “Meet the Press”
Democratic presidential candidate Bernie Sanders; U.S. Reps. Charlie Dent (R., Pa.) and Dave Brat (R., Va.)
CBS’ “Face the Nation”
Republican presidential candidates Ben Carson and Donald Trump; U.S. Rep. Mick Mulvaney (R., S.C.)
CNN’s “State of the Union”
Democratic presidential candidate Martin O’Malley; U.S. Reps. Tom Cole (R., Okla.), Raul Labrador (R., Idaho) and Debbie Wasserman Schultz (D., Fla)
“Fox News Sunday”
U.S. Rep. Jim Jordan (R., Ohio); former House Speaker Newt Gingrich

description: House leadership, the presidential campaign and more are scheduled for discussion on the Sunday news shows.
title: Sunday Talk Preview: House Leadership in Spotlight
